name: claude-hacks
description: Skills, commands, and hacks for Claude Code.

plugins.name: standup
plugins.description: Get up to speed on any project. Analyzes git history, PRs, issues to brief you on current state and next steps.

plugins.name: exa-code-context
plugins.description: Search billions of GitHub repos for real code examples using Exa API. Eliminates hallucinations with working patterns.

plugins.name: architecture-introspector
plugins.description: Analyze codebase architecture using first-principles thinking. Understand structure and design decisions.

plugins.name: explainer
plugins.description: Interactive teaching with chunked explanations and comprehension checks. For explaining code or concepts.

plugins.name: threaded-explainer
plugins.description: Deep-dive explanations with nested topic threads. For complex subjects requiring progressive disclosure.

plugins.name: mermaid-diagrams
plugins.description: Generate publication-quality Mermaid diagrams for flowcharts, sequences, ERDs, and more.

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Design distinctive frontend UIs. Produces unique, non-generic interfaces.

plugins.name: algorithmic-art
plugins.description: Create generative art using algorithms. SVG patterns, fractals, and procedural visuals.

plugins.name: ascii-art-explainer
plugins.description: Explain concepts using ASCII art visualizations. Terminal-friendly diagrams.

plugins.name: xml-context-engineering
plugins.description: Structure LLM context with XML tags for maximum attention efficiency. For prompt engineering.

plugins.name: task-orchestrator
plugins.description: Plan complex multi-step tasks with dependency analysis and parallel execution batching.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Create new Claude Code skills. Scaffolding and validation for skill development.

plugins.name: git-commit
plugins.description: Create git commits for session changes. Analyzes work and drafts appropriate commit messages.

plugins.name: describe-pr
plugins.description: Generate pull request descriptions from branch changes.

plugins.name: handoff
plugins.description: Create and resume session handoffs for multi-session work continuity.

plugins.name: plan-code-changes
plugins.description: Plan implementation changes before coding. Structured approach to modifications.

plugins.name: deslop
plugins.description: Remove slop and over-engineering from code. Simplify and clean up.

plugins.name: rich-simplicity
plugins.description: Apply Rich Hickey's Simple Made Easy principles to code review.

plugins.name: test-coverage
plugins.description: Analyze and improve test coverage for code changes.

plugins.name: swift-concurrency-expert
plugins.description: Swift Concurrency review and remediation for Swift 6.2+. Use when asked to review Swift Concurrency usage, improve concurrency compliance, or fix Swift concurrency compiler errors in a feature or file.

plugins.name: ascii-explainer
plugins.description: Explains code, algorithms, system design using ASCII diagrams. Trigger phrases - "explain visually", "I don't get it", "show me", "ascii diagram", "help me understand". Produces diagram-first explanations ending with TL;DR tables.

plugins.name: publish-skill
plugins.description: Port skills from any project to the claude-hacks marketplace. Use when publishing or sharing skills.

plugins.name: icp-analysis
plugins.description: Analyze a company to identify their Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs) - buyer personas, verticals, and flexible tier structures (2-5+ tiers based on business model). Use when asked to analyze ICPs, identify target customers, or understand buyer profiles.

plugins.name: lead-enrichment
plugins.description: Find 5-10 key decision makers per company with verified emails using Parallel, Apollo, and MillionVerifier APIs. Use when asked to enrich leads, find decision makers, or get contacts for companies.

plugins.name: socratic-protocol
plugins.description: Socratic method for resolving ambiguity in planning, conflicts, or design decisions. Includes edge case/failure analysis with intensity scaling, contradiction detection, and learning capture.

plugins.name: oracle
plugins.description: Strategic technical advisor for complex reasoning, architecture decisions, debugging after multiple failed attempts, and code review. Uses ULTRATHINK-level deep analysis with Opus model.

plugins.name: communication-coach
plugins.description: PROACTIVE skill - Claude invokes automatically when user messages exhibit anti-patterns. Detects recursive nesting, scope creep, buried asks, assumed context, stream dumps, imprecise descriptions. Disable with 'coach off' or 'raw mode'.
